mapper.insert: insert into user (userId, userPw, joinDate, location, nickname, phone, bYear, bMonth, bDay) values (#{userId}, #{userPw}, #{joinDate}, #{location}, #{nickname}, #{phone}, #{bYear}, #{bMonth}, #{bDay})
mapper.select: select * from user where userId=#{userId} and userPw=#{userPw} and deleted=0
mapper.update: update user set location=#{location}, nickname=#{nickname}, phone=#{phone}, byear=#{byear}, bmonth=#{bmonth}, bday=#{bday} where userIdx=#{userIdx}
mapper.select: select * from user where uuid=#{uuid} and deleted=0
mapper.update: update user set uuid=#{uuid} where userIdx=#{userIdx}
